body: Good way ti desensitize to stuff. Go to guro/necrophilia. Then read about one to two doujins. This is immediatley childs play conpared to that shit...

@mreirsrierm Read a lot of chick lit. Josei  and shoujo manhwas, wattpads, and a bunch of pocket books. You will be desensitized. A lot of male leads in female fantasy are a bunch of sociopaths and downright murderers. As a kid, I grew reading my mom's pocket book collection when I'm home alone. Explicit level shits. I still read some nowadays here and there. Compared to all the shit I've seen, this is pretty tame and wholesome ngl
guy below me is right, weird ass woman being ok with all that shit, anyway, translations kinda suck, tho it gets the message across, still unbearable to read

This guy raped his friend… and she still empathize with him? Woooowww, that is some bullshit. I still fapped but goddamn she should just outright be disgusted or horrified. Stupid bitch but otherwise good shit
